name: createVcdClusterV1
description: Create a vCD Cluster object by providing the address of the vCD Cluster and the credentials for an account on the vCD Cluster that has administrator privileges. This request initiates an asynchronous job to connect with the vCD Cluster and retrieve the required metadata.

body.description: IP address and account credentials of the vCD Cluster, and ID of the managing Rubrik cluster.

$ul: **endTime**: The end time of the request.
**message**: The error message for failed IDs.
**id**: The ID of the request object used to poll the status.
**nodeId**: The ID of the node where the job ran.
**progress**: The current percentage progress of the asynchronous request.
**startTime**: The start time of the request.
